description: This document describes a loosely coupled architecture for multimodal user interfaces, which allows for co-resident and distributed implementations, and focuses on the role of markup and scripting, and the use of well defined interfaces between its constituents.
title: Multimodal Architecture and Interfaces

description: This document serves as an introduction to OWL 2 and the various other OWL 2 documents. It describes the syntaxes for OWL 2, the different kinds of semantics, the available profiles (sub-languages), and the relationship between OWL 1 and OWL 2.
title: OWL 2 Web Ontology Language Document Overview (Second Edition)

description: This document is an overview of SPARQL 1.1. It provides an introduction to a set of W3C specifications that facilitate querying and manipulating RDF graph content on the Web or in an RDF store.
title: SPARQL 1.1 Overview

description: This is an extension to HTML which explicitly identifies a transcript linked to a media object such as audio or video.
title: A transcript extension for HTML

description: Frame Timing helps web developers measure the performance of their applications by giving them access to frame performance data to facilitate smoothness measurements.
title: Frame Timing

description: This document defines a mechanism by which a web page can embed a nested browsing context if and only if it agrees to enforce a particular set of restrictions upon itself.
title: Content Security Policy: Embedded Enforcement

description: The document defines the Initialization Data formats for use with the Encrypted Media Extensions API.
title: Encrypted Media Extensions Initialization Data Format Registry

description: This document defines the "keyids" Initialization Data format for use with the Encrypted Media Extensions API. It defines a stream format-independent format for specifying a list of key ID(s).
title: "keyids" Initialization Data Format

description: This document defines the "webm" Initialization Data format for use with the Encrypted Media Extensions API.
title: "webm" Initialization Data Format

description: This document defines the "cenc" Initialization Data format for use with the Encrypted Media Extensions API. It is commonly used with the ISO Common Encryption ('cenc') Protection Scheme for ISO Base Media File Format Stream Format.
title: "cenc" Initialization Data Format

description: This document defines the stream formats for use with the Encrypted Media Extensions API.
title: Encrypted Media Extensions Stream Format Registry

description: This document defines the stream format for using WebM content with the Encrypted Media Extensions API.
title: WebM Stream Format

description: This document defines the stream format for using ISO Base Media File Format content that uses the ISO Common Encryption ('cenc') protection scheme with the Encrypted Media Extensions API.
title: ISO Common Encryption ('cenc') Protection Scheme for ISO Base Media File Format Stream Format
